data.text: @zhuzichao @EUvsDisinfo What have they done? Also - WHO also voiced their concerns. Everyone's concerned.
@farqroy @EUvsDisinfo if what the US has done in Ukraine is nothing related to weapons, then why US worried?

@zhuzichao @EUvsDisinfo Oh man... Nice try... You have probably read nothing apart from the title (which contadicts what's inside). Biological research facilities exist in EVERY COUNTRY. She said nothing about warfare labs. This "World Socialist Web Site" is some #fakenews generator. #DontBeDeceived
@farqroy @EUvsDisinfo Russia must have spys on the US government, why they say different things?? https://t.co/7WQ8kqWGQe
@Marsides @EUvsDisinfo 事实证明，已经有专家去过武汉实验室，并没有所谓的病毒实验，
@RemmickRick @EUvsDisinfo 秘密进行的能让你知道吗？这是不可能的，全世界抵制生物武器，唯独美国却偷偷在进行实验

@zhuzichao @EUvsDisinfo Wait a moment - evidence of bio/chemical weapons manufacturing in Ukraine please.

Stop with this #whataboutism #bullshit. Don't chsnge the subject of discussion.

@farqroy @EUvsDisinfo How sick were you with invasion of Iraq & military interventions in Libya & Syria that caused gigantic humanitarian crises? Destruction of Yugoslavia? Travails of Afghans now under Taliban? Palestine? Ducking all this to justify your name?
